lender.name: FaithWorks Project
lender.loan_because: We want to empower emerging entrepreneurs globally and strengthen community development locally.
lender.occupational_info: We seek to glorify God by being the connection between compassionate donors, forward-thinking microfinance institutions and innovative, local community development initiatives.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: it feels good.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I try to make the world a better place. Kiva loans are a small step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small non-profit organization that helps older adults live safely and independently in their own homes for as long as possible.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I work for PayPal

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: Small loans make a BIG difference for hard-working people and families. I am very happy to find Kiva.org -- I want to help !
lender.occupational_info: I work at home for 18 years doing research and writing for lawyers who represent coal mining companies. We help to make electricity for the USA.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I believe we each can change the world, and providing someone with economic assistance allows them to feel self worth but also makes sense because it generates their countries economy.

lender.name: Leyla
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a chance

lender.name: Marbra
lender.loan_because: We like the ability to make a direct impact and believe that microloans have this effect.

lender.name: Lois & Sherwood
lender.loan_because: what a wonderful way to help others to help themselves. Poverty is the world's worst enemy.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: I can (a little, anyway), and it's a good thing to do. I have lived in Mexico and worked at an orphanage in the USSR, and I know a little money can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to foreign students at a university, and I love what I do. I feel very lucky.

lender.name: Delfino
lender.loan_because: it is vital for our planet's well-being to use our resources helping those who work for their families, communities and the environment, rather than helping corrupt governments & rich, international corporations.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and a computer engineer, living in Seattle, USA. I have traveled to many countries around the world, especially in Latin America, Asia and West Africa.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that what is a relatively small amount of money to me can make a big difference to someone else. I also like that these are loans, not one-time donations. Once repaid the money can be loaned out again!

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: Even though I need the money that I have, others need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I test printers before they are sold, to make sure that they work okay.

lender.name: Just Me
lender.loan_because: we are all responsible

lender.name: dani
lender.loan_because: I need much money for my business
lender.occupational_info: I am marketing stainless acesoris, I am looking for market in distric in indonesia and i want my acesoris can sel in the world like in asia state or uerope. In indonesia I always come to acesoris shop (departement store) and I need much money for my business.

lender.name: Manu
lender.loan_because: Because it makes so much sense and it is one excellent way to make a difference, at our one tiny level...Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Giving feels good! I have been blessed by many riches and want to give back to my fellow human beings.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I think this really works.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work for international NGOs, and understand the challenges facing entrepreneurs in developing countries. I'm also a former attorney, currently a consultant.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate. That said, I believe microcredit is a crucial tool in eliminating poverty...

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings and help others to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a medical device company that makes life-saving equipment.

lender.name: York
lender.loan_because: I like to help others in need. I also like the opportunity of feedback that the KIVA website gives us.
lender.occupational_info: I work to keep the environment and water clean.

lender.name: Brinn
lender.loan_because: I can. By eliminating one insignificant expenditure a week, I can help someone improve their life every week. How could I not?

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: I believe that what to us is a little amount of money goes a long way to help others. I also believe that a donation is like "feeding a man a fish"; it's nice, but it only lasts for a day. A loan is like "teaching a man [or woman] to fish"; it lasts forever, and allows him or her to create a self-sustaining business that generates more cash flow and contributes to viable and sustainable economic growth in developing nations. I also just love people from different countries and want to see them succeed!

lender.name: Tish
lender.loan_because: I can and I should, and I am so very happy to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people by trying to make the law useful and understandable to them.

lender.name: Pentastudio Architecture
lender.loan_because: We hope to assist people with small enterprises improve their abilities to provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We design healthy, creative environments for people working together -- architecture, interior design and graphics.

lender.name: Leticia
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Ph.D. student in biology.

lender.name: MIra and Jesse's Mom
lender.loan_because: I care and want to help in a way that I can share with my daughters and show them how lucky we are to be in a position to help and hopefully inspire them to do as much as they can when they are older.
lender.occupational_info: I work in New York City where much of the work for architects is to renovate existing interior spaces. Much of my work is for business offices but my firm does a lot of work for non-profit and labor organizations. We hope that our designs allow the employees of these agencies to better support the people that most need them.

lender.name: Morgan Stanley PIF
lender.loan_because:
Morgan Stanley gave us an opportunity to do something extraordinary for others. The Firm funded our team with an initial set of funds from which we would be able to execute our "Pay It Forward" idea.
For us, working in investment management, micro lending seemed like a fantastic opportunity. What's more, Kiva.org provided us with the best means with which to help others providing micro loans. Through Kiva.org we are able to see exactly where our money is being lent out to while being able to keep in contact with our borrowers.
We had 4 weeks to use this money to make a positive impact in our community. Our team looked to the global community. We took the time we were given, held some fundraisers and were able to raise our initial funding by 500%.
These funds are now loaned out of our non-withdrawable Kiva.org account.

lender.name: Greenpaperinc
lender.loan_because:
My work is to see that people most especialy mothers and children enjoy a good life on earth . You look around you will see many parents who are suppose to wake up in the morning with a cheerfull spirit looking dull and you will ask what seems to be the problem.
Well from survey if the youths and mothers are able to get loans for business creation it will be a much happier world for the children and mothers.
I want to support my community by issuing loans to mothers and youths to set up businesses to support there daily life.
lender.occupational_info: The Greenpaper Inc is a non governmental organization with Headquaters in Abuja Nigeria .We are participating in youths ,education and community development projects in local,national and international level of the globe for the good of the people.

lender.name: Peter & Susan
lender.loan_because: Why shouldn't we, who have so much, provide a helping hand - not a handout - to those not as lucky? Being born in the USA is, IMHO, a matter of luck.
lender.occupational_info: We design schools, universities, hospitals & other buildings for clients throughout California. Susan works in Occupational Medicine, with people hurt on the job, and at a local Free Clinic.

lender.name: hellohelllo
lender.loan_because: I love helping other people! My aunt made this account for me! I love it!

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power to change the world lies in the everyday relationships between people - the further you extend your reach to connect with others, the wider your networks become, the closer we all are, whatever our religion, culture, ethnicity, gender, or language
lender.occupational_info: I seek to understand the way that culture influences our thoughts and actions - and how a better understanding of those cultures other than our own can provide solutions to political and social problems

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you wish to see in the world" - Ghandi That's why.
lender.occupational_info: I educate the future of America and simultaneously (hopefully) open their eyes to the world around them and hopefully help them realize what they can achieve and accomplish once they set their minds to it. The students I teach are still at an impressionable age, but they're just learning to reason and comprehend adult topics and situations. I love each and every one of them as if they were my own. I could not imagine doing anything else.

lender.name: Dicey
lender.loan_because: Helping others makes me feel good! I believe that, by working together with a global vision, we can each make a difference and have a positive impact on the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the research and development of pharmaceutical and biological drugs.

lender.name: tricia
lender.loan_because: If as little as $25 can help someone become more self sufficient and support their families, how can one not. I believe in doing as much as possible to try and make the world a better place. This is a good way to help others all around the world. It takes as many people as possible to join the cause to fight poverty, inequality, protect the environment, and human rights world wide.
lender.occupational_info: I manage business accounts receiveables for a large corporation. I also volunteer to help abused/neglected kids express themselves through various art programs. I also plan on volunteering abroad someday.

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people any way I can. I am not wealthy but can surely spare enough money for these micro loans - often times, the same amount that I can easily spend for a meal out can be life changing to someone else in another part of the world.

lender.name: Goodarz
lender.loan_because: I believe Kiva provides a unique opportunity for us to alleviate poverty
lender.occupational_info: doing research on preventing heart disease and strok

lender.name: Margi
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky in many areas, and I can share. Wouldn't it be great if everyone who could would?

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity for me to offer help others and participate in people's lives all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an operating room. I set up the instruments and supplies needed and assist the surgeon during the surgery.

lender.name: desi hrevatis
lender.loan_because: this is not an act of charity. this is a manifestation of my belief that, given the right tools, we are all equally capable.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because:
2 Cor 9:6-11 Brothers and sisters, consider this: whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and whoever sows bountifully will also reap bountifully. Each must do as already determined, without sadness or compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver. Moreover, God is able to make every grace abundant for you, so that in all things, always having all you need, you may have an abundance for every good work. As it is written:
He scatters abroad, he gives to the poor; his righteousness endures forever.
The one who supplies seed to the sower and bread for food will supply and multiply your seed and increase the harvest of your righteousness.
You are being enriched in every way for all generosity, which through us produces thanksgiving to God.
lender.occupational_info: The art is my passion. A distributorship to sell golf equipment pays the bills. My husband and I have been well blessed. I am so grateful to have found the KIVA organization.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: To give others a chance!
lender.occupational_info: Manage a team of people!

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: People helping people is simply better.
lender.occupational_info: I publish educational curriculum for teaching children ages 2-12

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: solidarity.
lender.occupational_info: just a man

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." Winston Churchill
"Loan poor people money on terms that are suitable to them, teach them a few sound financial principles, and they will help themselves" , Mohammad Yunus

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I have never forgotten what it was like to be poor as a Czech refugee child in Germany after WW II. Our sponsor gave my family and I the chance to come to the U.S. I want to give in that spirit.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to care for chronically ill older people whose families cannot or do not wish to care for them at home, or for those who have no families.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: making a difference is an amazing amount of fun.
lender.occupational_info: I serve as a religious leader for a community of 500 people. I visit the sick, conduct religious services, teach and provide counsel to those in need.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: "Religion that God our Father accepts as pure and faultless is this: to look after orphans and widows in their distress and to keep oneself from being polluted by the world." James 1:27

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: I love all humans!

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I enjoy watching people grow and getting ahead. I hope the little bit I can help goes a long way. I am encouraged by all these wonderful people working for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for California State Government.

lender.name: shane
lender.loan_because: I want to try this
lender.occupational_info: I bring electricity into homes and businesses

lender.name: Reanna
lender.loan_because: My mummy wants me to learn about compassion and helping others.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: it is an elegant way to support people in many parts of the world that want to better their lives and provide a service in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I help growers in California sell their almond and walnut crops to buyers throughout the world.

lender.name: jocago
lender.loan_because: I think it can help.
lender.occupational_info: I deal in measurement of consumer behaviour.

lender.name: Gerhard & Tricia
lender.loan_because: it is better to help people directly, without the profit going to banks.
lender.occupational_info: I work on machines which process and sort mail. My wife, Tricia, works as an aide in a school. She works with children who have physical and or developmental disabilities

lender.name: Diana & Gordon
lender.loan_because: I believe that the true power of the internet is to allow individuals to connect in a way that makes the world a smaller, friendlier and better world.

lender.name: David & family
lender.loan_because: We believe in micro credit as a way to build peace.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a think thank that promotes international conflict resolution.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: It's a beautiful thing to do! I'm very excited about being part of a movement where we join together to help other people. Plus, Kiva's set-up allows for the money to be re-loaned - which allows us to create an ongoing chain of assistance. Bravo Kiva!

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: business in their local struggling society.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I have no reason not to.

lender.name: Matty
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Intense

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: "Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time. -Thomas Edison

lender.name: Michael & Jessica
lender.loan_because: Jessica and I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Jessica and I are attorneys. I advise businesses about how they can achieve their goals, and defend them when they are accused of breaking the law. Jessica currently works for three judges. She helps them make decisions about how to resolve disputes between people. She ultimately plans to defend individuals who have been accused of serious crimes.

lender.name: Alan & Mary Jane
lender.loan_because: I have faith in humankind and prefer to give directly to those who need it most
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve the current and future prospects of children and youth in more than 60 countries by raising money from governments and corporation that are used to implement education, health, employment and citizenship programs in those countries

lender.name: joan & freeman
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in their business endeavors
lender.occupational_info: Nursing for many years in general hospital

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: At least someone will take "lobbyist money" these days!
lender.occupational_info: I represent companies before the United States Congress.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: It's a small step in the right direction.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I believe we are responsible for each other.
lender.occupational_info: Selling video conferencing over the internet. www.myvideotalk.com. Online trading

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I started a computer business back in the 1980's and was very lucky.

lender.name: esy
lender.loan_because: the need has been seen, felt, and not forgotten.
lender.occupational_info: recording the stories of lives that are not commonly heard from, over here. the way that your life is read and remembered can change the life of another, across the planet.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone that is helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I tell homebuyers or home sellers how much their home is worth based on the most recent home sales in their neighborhood.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: everyone benefits when small businesses prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I am a dream shaper.

lender.name: Cthulu
lender.loan_because: it might make a difference

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to. I look forward to making another small loan each month.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a fish counter at an American food store. People want fish, shrimp, shellfish, whatever, I give them what they want.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: "...love is the mystery of the appearance of God.....love is the highest honor for all the nations of men.....be ye manifestations of the love of God....." Baha'ullah
lender.occupational_info: I work and volunteer with children---I like to help them with math because it makes them feel better to understand their math---so they can spend more time having fun!!

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: it is our responsibility to help others and I want to help those in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies with their legal problems.

lender.name: Ling
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have a chance to reverse the vicious cycle of poverty.

lender.name: Bardya
lender.loan_because: I have more then most, and am grateful for what I have.
lender.occupational_info: Rewarding

lender.name: J. B.
lender.loan_because: I believe good energy creates good energy. By supporting efforts to further develop the global economy we all prosper and it is the less fortunate half of the world that needs to most help, yet recevies the least attention. Let's all work together to make a difference-globally. It will help us all.
lender.occupational_info: Building and developing markets for new software and on-line services.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help others. I have so much compared to most people of the world...and when I give of my time, energy and/or money I become more grounded to what's really important in life. And because of this I have more peace, a greater sense of value and joy in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I have a great job!...in short I get to encourage, inspire, listen to and help kids!...and their folks, too!

lender.name: Yuka
lender.loan_because: I believe that this IS the way bringing people out of poverty, thus less crimes, thus less struggles, thus less war, and ultmately, world peace.
lender.occupational_info: Working many different jobs to pay bills and saev money to travel, so I can go help more people in the world.

lender.name: Garry
lender.loan_because: We should share the world's resources with those who are willing to work to help themselves, their families, and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I start small businesses, grow them into bigger businesses, and then sell them off.

lender.name: arturo ortiz
lender.loan_because: I believe in change and helping people you dont know

lender.name: Tielman
lender.loan_because: Born and raised in South Africa, I am a child of the developing world. I have seen first hand the impact a small loan can make.
lender.occupational_info: I run a Food and Beverage Consultancy and I have spent the last ten years in Asia and East Africa.

lender.name: Alessandra
lender.loan_because: I watched the KIVA segment on PBS's "Frontline/World." I was so impressed and touched. I applaud you for making the world a better place.

lender.name: Lars Ivar
lender.loan_because: I believe this model of helping works.
lender.occupational_info: I am a programmer and consultant, developing software.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I traveld for 5 weeks in India. It hurt to see how hard the people there work for so little return. I wanted to help in some way.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: We should help each other out.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It's all about giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I have the priviledge to teach and be taught by our children, our future.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: My family and I love to help others
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy their first homes

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my family with so much and we are so very thankful. Through his son, Jesus, and the love He has taught me, giving and helping others is an expression of His will and love. Love is God and action is enabling His will. These loans are actions and the reason I give is love for others and an obedience to God.

lender.name: Coco
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Coco is no longer with us but lives on by rolling over her loans.

lender.name: Mary Dell
lender.loan_because: sometimes only a little help is all that is needed to change a life.
lender.occupational_info: international tour operator. We take groups all over the world

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I feel in my heart that there's good in all people. Sometimes, they just need a bit of help to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired from working but in my time I fill it with many crafts. Knitting, sewing, papercrafts, constructing of artificial flowers, jewelry creations and volunteering at my local hospital's gift shop. Also an avid Texas Hold 'Em poker player!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I read about Kiva.org in a magazine and I was so impressed by how elegant the idea was, I signed up immediately. I'm grateful to be able to take even a small part in this movement.
lender.occupational_info: I draw comic books and produce animation for television.

lender.name: Griffin's Grandma
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of hope........If not me...... whom? If not now..... when?

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: It empowers.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I fully subscribe to the belief that if you give a man a fish he'll eat for a day, if you teach a man to fish he'll eat for a lifetime. Assisting people to obtain the tools to be self sufficient betters society world-wide.
lender.occupational_info:
I work at a company that clones cattle, horses and pigs. The word "clone" causes quite a stir amongst the American public mostly due to a lack of real information as to what cloning really is and what its benefits are.
With a growing human population, and shrinking natural resources, we have to be efficient in how we produce our food. Cloning is a new tool to use in conjunction with regular breeding to pass on desirable but sometimes rare traits like natural disease resistance and efficient feed to meat conversion ratios more effectively. At the end of the day it's still about breeding better animals to feed more people.

lender.name: Yair
lender.loan_because: I believe its the right thing to do, no religion necessary.
lender.occupational_info: I build software for businesses.

lender.name: Anil
lender.loan_because: Worked in Africa for 10 years and saw the rich African heritage and unmatched simplicity in African people. Just started to help the needy.
lender.occupational_info: Information technology

lender.name: Jeff and Kris
lender.loan_because: It is a Faith Response. We have 3 grown children, and have a good life. We have worked hard and have reaped the rewards, We hope to make a small difference for someone else in this way. "If you love Him, why not serve Him". We loan because we want to share with others. To do good, you actually have to do something!
lender.occupational_info: Jeff is a Pharmacist and former hospital administrator Kris is a Hair Stylist

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: So little can do so much.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of psychology in Cairo, Egypt

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help people in need. God has blessed me with a good job and I need to be a good steward of the money he has given me. I think that this is a good way to use it.

lender.name: Anne-Carolyn
lender.loan_because: The more we give, the more there is to go around.
lender.occupational_info: I sing with orchestras and opera companies all around the United States - and hopefully soon around the world!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering individuals; effecting change in people's lives, the lives of their families, and their communities. We are all connected by the common threads of humanity and we need to help one another.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the blessings in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit books in the areas of spirituality, empowerment, and parenting.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help provide opportunity for those who could use some.
lender.occupational_info: Computers - Software Development

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to help other kids.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a kid. Right now that takes up most of my time.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I can and it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I'm excited about having a little money go a long way! This is such a great portal for money to flow where it's needed - and for it to flow back.

lender.name: Janice & Keith
lender.occupation: Legal Analyst and Director of Special Events
lender.loan_because: micro lending makes real changes in the lives of the people receiving the loans.

lender.name: Yayne-Abeba
lender.loan_because: I am first generation Ethiopian and I have seen first hand how poverty destroys lives. I believe that we all have a responsibility to eachother in this world. We are all connected in some way. I feel blessed to be able to help others help themselves live a life with purpose and joy.
lender.occupational_info: I make people laugh!! I love it!!!!

lender.name: Van
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Prairie House Gallery
lender.occupation: Small gallery dedicated to North American art.
lender.loan_because: One of the goals of Prairie House Gallery is to be a good neighbour. In our purchase, we try to buy local. In our practices, we try to go Green. Kiva gives us one more way to help leave a better place than it might otherwise have been.
lender.occupational_info: Prairie House Gallery was a small on-line art gallery that featured local artists, especially First Nation (Native American) artists and local(Midwestern) and other artists from the United States. We typically bought directly from the artist, or from one of their direct distributors. In this way, we tried to make sure that the artist got a fair price for his or her work. The gallery was our dream. It was more of a "hobby" than a buisness because we lost money regularly, but we had fun doing it. In recent months changes in regulations have forced us to stop selling-- at least for the foreseeable future. The taxing regulations just became too complicated to justify the hobby. We will continue on Kiva with our personal funds. We are keeping the website for now, but we aren't certain what we will do next. In the mean time, I am linking to my writings on Lulu instead of the gallery with nothing to offer. Enjoy!

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: in care.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to be a blessing.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount can make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: I try to describe how language actually is used, not how it is "supposed" to be used.

lender.name: MOLLY
lender.loan_because: it reminds me how much i really have
lender.occupational_info: computers,computers,computers

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Defne
lender.loan_because: I like to do good.
lender.occupational_info: poverty alleviation

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It gives people the chance to improve their lives and comunities.
lender.occupational_info: I install and maintain network computer systems.

lender.name: Calvin
lender.loan_because:
I learn about geography, culture and humanity.
I lend with the help of my parents.
lender.occupational_info: I am a middle school student.

lender.name: Jeremie
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself I know the desire and drive required to build a sustainable business. I also know that everybody needs support - be it financial or emotional - to get where they want to go.
lender.occupational_info: I run a computer software company that helps money managers operate more efficiently.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I wish to help people become independant.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and paint.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: My daughter set this account up for me for Fathers Day so I can help others reach their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I teach business education at a local high school. This is my second career after working in international marketing.

lender.name: Elizabeth & Josh
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to use our blessings to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: Elizabeth: I work with children helping them to develop thier communication and confidence to be successful members of society. Josh: I work youth and hope to fill them with a desire to affect positive change through a love for others and for Christ.

lender.name: Rhett
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant way to help. It not only gives, but it helps people get on their feet, people who really need it. It is one amazing idea,I am excited to help.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: The Spirit of the Sovereign Lord is upon me, because the LORD has appointed me to bring good news to the poor. He has sent me to comfort the brokenhearted and to announce that captives will be released and prisoners will be freed.
lender.occupational_info: I make maps with computers to make the city I live in more efficient.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: To support others who are making efforts to improve their lives and the economic well being of their communities.

lender.name: S n J
lender.loan_because: Its empowering people to be financially free, and there shouldnt be such struggles in first place, its one world.

lender.name: Noemi
lender.loan_because: We as human beings "need" to help each other to survive, thrive, and to be happy.... that's what life is all about....
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist... painter

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I haven't forgotten where I came from.

lender.name: Patty
lender.occupational_info: I take care of Elders with Alzheimer's disease.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I thought this would be a good way to feel like I was doing something (however small) to help someone else. It is also a way to feel connected to other people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a television station, helping out with local newscasts and putting stories and videos on the internet.

lender.name: Keara
lender.loan_because: God has provided me with the opportunity!

lender.name: Garzon Family
lender.loan_because: I've been interested in microfinance for years. God has blessed me with a well-paying job, so I'm thrilled to be able to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the finances of a family-owned real estate investment company.

lender.name: Robert & Claudia
lender.loan_because: Hopefully the people will capitalize on the opportunity presented and succeed in bettering their lives, and especially those of their children.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I've been poor, and I've been affluent. I'll tell ya' ---being poor SUCKS !!
I feel it's time to lend a hand to those less fortunate than I am. And this is the ONLY way I know of that actually WORKS!
lender.occupational_info: Ne'er-do-well piano player. Professional musician for more than 50 years. (22 of them in Air Force bands, including the USAF BAND, Washington, D.C. and the USAF ACADEMY BAND, Colorado Springs, Col.) Now --Retired......(back to being a ne'er-do-well)..

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I feel that money that may not seem like a huge amount to me IS a huge amount to somone else and they can use it wisely.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I really like that ordinary people can make a difference in a strangers life and the lives of their children. I think it is also amazing how creative these people are.

lender.name: CMC
lender.loan_because: C-I want to help people who need it and I want the world to be safe. M-I want to help people get money for shoes for the summer, clothes, and food. C- I want to help people be really safe and I want the world to be safe because I don't want people to die.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves seems the best way to improve lives.
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my time reading and looking after my home and family.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: The good that we do will live on long after we are gone. It is our true legacy.
lender.occupational_info: I process aeronautical data from 120 countries so that accurate aviation products are provided to pilots. This enables them to fly anywhere in the world.

lender.name: Javier y Cristina
lender.loan_because: Even if you are lucky or not in life, always there are people living worst than you. / Por muy mal que uno est, desgraciadamente siempre existe alquien peor.

lender.name: Rima
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference, and help out. We can all work together to eliminate poverty.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I have a social responsibility to do so.

lender.name: bret
lender.loan_because: I want to make money back.
lender.occupational_info: Terrible. Do something else for a living.

lender.name: Brett
lender.occupational_info: Work in the horticultural industry, selling fruit to Australian retailers

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I want you to have the same opportunities as I do. Opportunities to build a future for my family in a way that will also benefit the community I live in.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business helping people to access the Internet when they travel away from home. I do this by setting up Wireless hotspots in public locations. I also design and build websites and web applications for other local business people.

lender.name: Marvin
lender.loan_because: Have been to cambodia and realize the need in this country

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I can. There isnt any other reason why. I am able to financially, so why should I not? It may not be thousands, or even hundreds of dollars... but I can at least give SOMETHING.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the Air Force, and I work on computers and computer networks - the linking of computers together enabling the sharing of information.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It is just the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Writer. Documentary filmmaker.

lender.name: Rajib Lochan
lender.loan_because: I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: Starting up the business in the areas of Telcoms, IT, & Broadcasting mainly in consulting, Resourcing, Outsourcing work (software development, Call Centres, etc..). Providing solutions, in the areas of IPTV, Digital TV, CableTV, MobileTV, VoIP, etc... (raj_mahalik@yahoo.co.uk)

lender.name: Andrew and Rhett
lender.loan_because: Good people do good things.
lender.occupational_info: We raise money in events and lend it to people who need a little help to improve their lives.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Just trying to make a difference one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help hospitals in the US become more effective in treating their patients.

lender.name: Don & Nancy
lender.loan_because: we are able to and hope to leave the world a better place than the one we entered.

lender.name: Anand
lender.loan_because: You never know where opportunity will take you.
lender.occupational_info: Science and technology development

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in responsible microcredit. Loans allow entrepreneurs who need financing to get started with their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the areas of human rights, public legal education, and business administration for groups that have traditionally been disadvantaged.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I heard of this website through a family member who has worked in Microfinance in Africa for several years. I really like the concept of helping people to help themselves, hopefully in a long term way.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am so thrilled to have an opportunity to directly help a person who has a good plan to make life better and more secure.
lender.occupational_info: Students come to my house to learn how to play the piano. They are boys and girls from 6 to 18 years old. I also have some students who are much older and have always liked music and want to play themselves.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship offers people dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I have much respect for anyone who attempts to better their life by putting faith in people and economics.
lender.occupational_info: I am an auditor of various types of companies including manufacturers and not-for profits.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people across the globe but still keep it on a personal level.

lender.name: john mck
lender.loan_because: We have so much in the west, and can all afford to give something to support those in need around the world.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I have much to be thankful for and I believe it's important to give back to the world.

lender.name: Fred Toulouse FRANCE
lender.loan_because: micro credit is the key to help people in need

lender.name: Dean Pajevic
lender.loan_because: So many people in the world get by on so little. It feels good to help someone out. And because of kiva.org, it's super easy to do.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medical laboratory near Boston.

lender.name: Carlotta
lender.loan_because: I feel the program is the most effective mechanism to eradicate poverty worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I investigate property for the presence of contamination that may be a hazard to people or the environment and devise ways to make it safe once more.

lender.name: Mickie & Steve
lender.loan_because: As as a female small business owner myself, I know the power of supporting my family with my business. What an opportunity to help others gain the same support and independence I have found!
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney, and own my own firm. I mostly work from my home, but meet with clients at my office. My husband is a medical student, who will soon be a cardiologist.

lender.name: Harry Gold
lender.loan_because: There are plenty of honest, hard working, creative people around the world who could use a little help from good neighbors, and it's easy to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a regular guy. I currently work building web sites in beautiful California near the San Francisco Bay.

lender.name: Andrea & Drew
lender.loan_because: We're fortunate enough to give others the same "leg-up" we've been given.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: Namaste

lender.name: Doug&Erika
lender.loan_because: I've worked hard to own my own home and have children. I want to give other hard workers a chance to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher who now stays home to raise my three young children.

lender.name: Jane Cummings Carlson
lender.loan_because: It's time to share.
lender.occupational_info: I help protect the health of the forests.

lender.name: Jay & Ci
lender.loan_because: We want to bless other people the way God blessed us.

lender.name: www.3outcomes.com
lender.loan_because: Sharing what I have has me appreciate it. Looking at the people who are starting and enhancing their businesses also has me more inspired with mine. And, I'd love to meet the people I loan to so that I can bring more vitality and money to their families.
lender.occupational_info: Search on "Living Green" in itunes podcast directory and you will find my podcast. It was rated in the Top 100 of itunes in June of 2007. I coach business executives and do keynotes. Learn more at www.3outcomes.com.

lender.name: Doug and Karen Williams
lender.loan_because: Some very important people encouraged us to do this.

lender.name: Jarrod
lender.loan_because: I am deeply commited to creating opportunities for others and to making a real difference to others. I have a driving passion to do little things that evoke huge, positive changes in the lives of other people. We can all save the world - one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: My work entails investing in residential and commercial real estate. I have a vast array of interests in which I actively participate and I always enjoy traveling and meeting new people. Feel free to contact me or learn more about me through my LinkedIn profile (click the link below).

lender.name: rothkids
lender.loan_because: We have traveled to many places and seen how much difference a few dollars can make.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a fighting chance to achieve a better quality of life for themselves and the community in which they live.
lender.occupational_info: Licensing of products and technology for the purpose of improving human health.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: All of the loan goes directly to the entrepeneur.
lender.occupational_info: I use ultrasound to take pictures and measurements of people's hearts. I enjoy the challenge and have been scanning for thirty years.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: Everyone has the responsibility to change the world, and make it a better place, and these micro loans are just one way that someone more privileged than others can help make someones life a better one to live.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 20 years old and am currently a full time college student at Muskegon Community College,eduation is a very important thing to me and i feel very luck to be going here. I'm still deciding what i want to do with the rest of my life, but i know it's going to be in the Medical Field because i love helping people.

lender.name: Swati
lender.loan_because: Because I have been fortunate to grow up in Canada where I have had free education, lived in a very multicultural city with free medical system and never have been a victim of war. I am very privileged and know the feeling of that freedom I have. I feel I have a responsibility to give because I believe that through my loans I could give the opportunity to make poverty a history for one or two or many families.
lender.occupational_info:
My company is a printing company, which prints all kinds of printed material from, business cards, postcards, posters, books, flyers, ect..
I also want to make a note that as one of my past promotions for a month, 10% of sales on certain printed materials were given to Kiva. I also have a regular client who comes to print jobs and every job they print through my company they give 10% to Kiva to.

lender.name: jujo
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference
lender.occupational_info: we own a cafe and gift shop in small country town,Joel makes furniture and sculptures to sell ,Jude cooks delicious food for cafe and serves customers.

lender.name: Jules
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship. Open your eyes and then you'll find the right people who'll inspire and empower you to reach your goal.
lender.occupational_info: I work in PR /Marketing.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Everyone who has the courage to take his destiny in its own hand, deserves admiration and support
lender.occupational_info: Peter is chief of the educationbureau of the city townhall

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: I like to believe that it can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying at university for a PhD in organic chemistry.

lender.name: Merrie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Melinda
lender.occupation: Small Business Coach and Life Coach
lender.loan_because: I have had mentors and coaches who helped me when I needed it and I love to give back. I am blessed to live in a prosperous country. We all have a responsibility to help others in need, be that our neighbour or someone in another country.
lender.occupational_info: The web expert in Business Planning - just for work at home mums!

lender.name: Heli
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make their dreams come true!
lender.occupational_info: I help professional photographers take pictures of people for magazines. I also make videos for nightclubs and promoters. I hope to start making fundraising videos for non-profit organizations.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I want to invest in people not organisations or governments.
lender.occupational_info: Self employed book seller who took up this business after retireing from working for many years for the UK government.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I hope that peer to peer lending will continue to grow throughout the world as a solution for finding means and fulfilling dreams. Thank you, KIVA - for this opportunity to participate in such a wonderful concept!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for Citizenship and Immigration Canada but I am training to be a teacher.

lender.name: Terence
lender.loan_because: I think it is great to loan to others who want health and safety for their family. What we spend for pleasure can help change the life of a friend I have not met. This is just one step to help others in need and promote good will and peace on this one world we all share.
lender.occupational_info: I have spent many years teaching HIV /AIDS education. I had to leave my job to take care of myself. This is now my 23rd year of living with AIDS. I want to help others across the world any way I can.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: learning, playing, helping

lender.name: Quenjana
lender.loan_because: I believe good measures return to you tenfold.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage young people through the inspiration of God's Word and the refreshing spirit of basketball.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I'm very happy to be able to give hard-working people a little help!

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: We are all brothers and sisters on this little blue planet.
lender.occupational_info: I help facilitate healing and emotional wholeness for those who have experienced trauma from life circumstances.

lender.name: ilyandra
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that did not have the opportunities I have had.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a law firm that helps people who have been cheated.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have enough for my own family. I want others to have the ability to provide for their families and live a meaningful life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker. I take care of my husband and my 16-year-old daughter.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping people.

lender.name: cynthia
lender.loan_because: It amazes and thrills me to see how such a small amount of money can make a significant difference in the lives of these people.

lender.name: Beryl
lender.loan_because: It is nice to be able to help people to help thenselves, especially in developing areas.

lender.name: Darcey
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Al W. F.
lender.loan_because: I have seen the need for microloans in Central America and in the Middle East. I have great interest in loans in Nigeria. I intend to follow up in neaar future on closer basis.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Engineer Officer that has help build schools, clinics, latrines, roads, wells and other projects all as a military officer of U.S. Army. Army Engineer branch is often the "goodwill" face of our military. Vast majority of soldiers work very hard and are greatly appreciated for projects we build. Tremendous sense of satisfaction received in helping and serving others.

lender.name: LAWR
lender.loan_because: i believe Margaret Meade: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has."
lender.occupational_info: pro-active advocacy for women

lender.name: Mark & Joanne
lender.loan_because: it gives someone the opportunity to improve their lives and develop their skills.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: I loan because what seems to be a small amount of money makes such a BIG difference in these people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and a high school Foods teacher. .

lender.name: KAREN
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me and therefore I need to bless others less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: We inspect homes for buyer

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make something of themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank during the summer and study classical music at a school for music during the fall and spring.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I feel it makes an impact on people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student majoring in International Relations. I am also a member of the Genocide Intervention Network, a great non-profit organization working to help stop the genocide in Darfur.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I have received lots of help, financial and other, and it's meant a lot to me and I think I owe it to those who cared for me to make their efforts worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university professor teaching literature. I think literature can point out or inspire what humanity is and why and how we should really appreciate it.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: It's a positive way to help people helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make birthday cakes to order and for the showcase in a bakery, as well as baking breads and buns

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I saw the program on KIVA on Public Broadcasting and was very impressed. I like the ability to help individuals around the world directly.
lender.occupational_info: I organize and run a program to support non-native English speakers to get better jobs.

lender.name: catherine
lender.loan_because: I like the idea and method

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I have a deep need to share with those in need and have been frustrated by the difficulties involved in trying to financially help peoples in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a hospital who cares for infants and children

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference. I got to see it in action as a Kiva Fellow in Uganda in 2008.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe that microcredit loans are doing more good than grants or direct aid will ever do
lender.occupational_info: a doctor in the United States Navy.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women in the world who aren't as fortunate as I have been.

lender.name: Kaily
lender.loan_because: I learned about micro loans in my Senior Current Issues class at my high school in Muskegon, Michigan. I feel that it is important to give people a chance at a good life and to make them feel worthwhile while watching their own business grow.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Michigan State University and am hoping to persue a degree in Genomics and Molecular Genetics to become a genetic counselor.

lender.name: Arizona Family
lender.loan_because: We believe giving someone a "hand up" is better than giving them a "hand out".

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I can loan a little money and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I spend mornings sorting my mail into delivery order. I enjoy the variety of spending time with friends in the station and then going out on my own and delivering the mail to my customers.

lender.name: Wiederhold
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help poor people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school student trying to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because: It is nice to be able to help others, it makes the world a much better place. It has been said that to those who things have been given much is expected in return. So it is my duty and privilege to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Support of server/computer operating systems, security, patching, and other such system maintenance.

lender.name: Jessica Begen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of each individual to achieve.

lender.name: Summit NW Minisries
lender.loan_because: It's more blessed to give than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of Christians who share the core value, "service is the highest form of worship".

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: My loan can help others who want to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Lydia E. Robles
lender.loan_because: I cannot see a better use for my money.

lender.name: Colleen & Stephen
lender.loan_because: we believe in this program and are grateful we can contribute.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I care about the rest of the world. It is everyone's job and responsibility to keep it runing smooth.
lender.occupational_info: I am a first year college student. I am studing History and Government!

lender.name: P-Air
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to positively impact entrepreneurs trying to develop their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work with early stage technology companies to help them grow their businesses by sharing my contacts and ideas to make their ideas bigger.

lender.name: Tullia F.
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microlending.
lender.occupational_info: Distilling complex concepts in the simplest and most persuasive way possible.

lender.name: Thomasina
lender.loan_because: Even at my level here in the United States which is basic...I still have SO MUCH compared to many of the people featured here on KIVA and in many other parts of the world. I admire people who have some spirit to try and get out of their circumstances and have a chances and opportunities to have the things they need while helping others in their community as well get to a better standard of living.

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: My Violin was run over by a truck in the streets of Mexico while heading to a audition for Mexico's Idol. It was a stratocaster given to me by my great grandfather and I would like to replace it.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a violin player

lender.name: Mahadir
lender.loan_because: I want to establish an educational foundation to help inland people in East Kalimantan by providing schools with high quality books and courses to develop their region. I took this step since the education dept in my country still has difficulties providing schools inland of borneo with high quality materials. Hopefully with the present of my foundation, all of this problem can be decreased
lender.occupational_info: I am an English teacher in East Borneo, Indonesia. My school name is SMAN 10 Melati Samarinda. You can find everything about the school by visiting our website: www.sma10melati.com

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I'm able and it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I know what it takes to run its own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am self-employed. I translate and localize video games.

lender.name: Arturo & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Luke 6:30 "Give to everyone who asks you, and if anyone takes what belongs to you, do not demand it back."
lender.occupational_info: We are regular people with ordinary jobs but through the gift of salvation in Jesus Christ, we have become tremendously blessed in the spirit and we want to share that joy with you. God Bless you. (^_^)

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I am deeply impressed by the punctual repayment rates of borrowers in developing countries compared with the high default rates of borrowers in the U.S. Loaning through Kiva is one way to recognize and support people for their integrity and their initiative.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I want to support small 'craft' businesses like myself!
lender.occupational_info: I design patterns for handknitted garments.

lender.name: Manu & Claude
lender.loan_because: We know what it is like to need a little help for a project in which we believe.
lender.occupational_info: Choosing, buying & selling books & nice gifts in our store

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because:
I believe we can change the world, one person at a time. It is not just "live and let live," but "live and help live."
"In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love." Mother Teresa
"If a free society cannot help the many who are poor, it cannot save the few who are rich." John F Kennedy, 35th US president
My charities: Donors Choose: http://www.donorschoose.org/homepage/main.html Food for the Poor: http://www.foodforthepoor.org/ Global Giving: http://www.globalgiving.com/ Habitat for Humanity: http://www.habitat.org/
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse and provide acute dialysis services for our 4 area hospitals.

lender.name: Vance
lender.loan_because: I like hugs.
lender.occupational_info: It's like pizza.

lender.name: Howard & Lucy
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is better to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
I am retired at the moment but hope to work again.
Lucy, my wife, is a counselor.

lender.name: Irja
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. Kiva makes it easy!

lender.name: Larry Schoonover
lender.loan_because: I was very moved while reading an article some years ago about this concept. I recently was on a trip and read the InFlight magazine on Alaska Airlines which had an article about micro-lending and renewed my interest. I intend to do more personally and to motivate others to get involved as well. I am interested in finding others in my area who are lenders.
lender.occupational_info: Speaker, Author and all around good guy.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I'll never be able to pay back all the people who have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I practice and teach emergency medicine in a major academic center and run the student health service for a private university with a student population of 7,000

lender.name: Lorie
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children, helping them develop their communication skills.

lender.name: Riva
lender.loan_because: I believe that togehter we can make a difference.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I think connecting with people all over the world makes for a smaller more compassionate world.
lender.occupational_info: retired-old-garden & volunteer.

lender.name: Linna & Johan
lender.loan_because: Because we can.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: Because I can, I should, and I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I type legal documents. In the evenings I make jewelry with friends.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: Kiva is about people empowering people on a grass-roots level. It is exciting to think that I can do that for someone on the other side of the world...with a "click!"

lender.name: Leo and Rebeca Ferreira
lender.occupation: Leo is Humanitarian / Rebeca is a Grad Student
lender.loan_because: 1. It can end poverty. 2. Because we can. 3. Because it is needed. 4. Because everyone deserves a chance. 5. Because we are happy to give :)

lender.name: Prince of Peace Catholic
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. The only reason to ever look down on a person is to lend a hand and help them up.
lender.occupational_info: Beyond academics, I want to empower my students and teach them how to make a difference in our world.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: This world is big enough for all of us to find our dreams
lender.occupational_info: I teach University Students. I also do research. My interest is social psychology.

lender.name: Dina
lender.occupation: President of a Massage Therapy School

lender.name: C.c.
lender.loan_because: We have adopted children from all over the world and want to give back to the world to help it become a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse and take care of minor to very sick people. God gives me the strength to continue to help heal those in need.

lender.name: Paymon
lender.loan_because: it is a right thing to do!

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: my grandmother was a small business owner
lender.occupational_info: help people find jobs

lender.name: Higgins
lender.loan_because: My students contribute to a charity bucket every time they are caught cussing. They then choose what worthy cause the money goes to. It turns a negative into a positive. This last year they chose Kiva (with a little encouragement from me.) I figured it had the advantage of being a continuing impact and they could see the person they were helping.
lender.occupational_info: I attempt to teach high school kids social studies and hopefully a little bit of the "greater good" concept.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It is a small token I can give to try to change someone else's life. It gives me instant gratification!
lender.occupational_info: My company helps football/soccer clubs in Brazil make more money by managing their membership base

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping other women achieve their dream of owning their own businesses!!

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help out
lender.occupational_info: lots of radiation

lender.name: Paul Los Gatos, Calif
lender.occupational_info: IBM Sales Manager

lender.name: Mahesh
lender.loan_because: I care about welfare of people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Chemistry.

lender.name: Tadio
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard working people to succeed and improve their family life.

lender.name: Chirag
lender.loan_because: that loan will empower someone to improve their life...
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers.

lender.name: George & Cindy
lender.loan_because: I have been self employed most all my life and I am honored to help others who want to help themselves. Thanks Kiva for this wonderful opportunity and thank you Donna for turning me on to this site.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I believe that microloans get it right - they may be the best hope of reducing extreme poverty. I'm grateful to have a way to participate.
lender.occupational_info: love me? feedmysheep. loveme? feedmysheep. loveme? feedmysheep. loveme? feed....

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is always better than charity. People need to learn to help themselves, and mirco-loans are the way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I run a number of internet-based companies.

lender.name: Dor
lender.loan_because: To offer someone else an opportunity to improve their life. We all deserve that opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Property and franchising in the UK.

lender.name: Joel and Emily
lender.occupation: Small Business Manager and Software Team Manager
lender.loan_because: We think micro-lending is an exciting opportunity to help entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We own a custom window coverings franchise, Budget Blinds. Joel manages our business, and Emily works for Hewlett Packard as a Software Team Manager.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: i like to see people develop to their full potential
lender.occupational_info: i build computer networks

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: You have to add your light to the sum of light a wise man once said.
lender.occupational_info: I love my job. I see regular customers every day . I get to listen to good music while I work.When the store is not busy I can clean or even watch movies on my little dvd player. It's the most fun job I've had.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because:
I want to put something back into this world.
We have an opportunity to help people help themselves which charity does not do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in IT defining companies Voice communication strategies and directions.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have had a successful carrier because people people had confidence in me and helped me get started. Now, it is my turn to help others realize their goals
lender.occupational_info: I am retired after 30 plus years working in the energy field. I now consult for selected clients and donate time and support to my local church and my college.

lender.name: Narayan
lender.loan_because: Small drops make the ocean

lender.name: Rafin
lender.loan_because: It helps!

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world one person at a time.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with health and love and happiness and laughter and amazing friends and family. If I can help repay even a fraction of my blessings, I will try to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work as Marketing and Communications Manager for Envirofit International, a non-profit working to bring pollution-reducing technologies to developing world markets.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because:
I am a capitalist, who believes in the power of small business to change the world. Small business owners have an investment in their community. And therefore it is in their best interest to try to improve their environment.
Giving money and resources away is usually a disaster in the long run. But when money is loaned, the recipient has a vested interest in improving his or her business, creating a self sustainable situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, to maintain web sites that sell products over the internet.

lender.name: Bernie
lender.occupational_info: Help promote companies and organizations using various methods such as promotional products and apparel, direct mail, and incentives

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I love the fact that even a small amount of money can make such a big difference to the lives of these people. I donate to a number of other charities/organizations where I never see the person that my donation actually helps. I love the fact that I get to see who I am helping! It makes it feels so much more personal.
lender.occupational_info: I am at home with my young kids.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: When people can be helped sustainably, that's better than charity.
lender.occupational_info: I use computer simulations to study white blood cells.

lender.name: Scott & Susan
lender.loan_because: sometimes it takes just a little help to change peoples lives. In my past, I know God through others has helped me a lot by the little they did.

lender.name: Nanda
lender.loan_because: "No man is an island,entire of itself; every man is a piece of the continent------because I am involved in mankind" John Donne.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university museum to develop programs that teach people about art.

lender.name: Husslage Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in empowering people to become the best they can be - to stand on their own and be proud.
lender.occupational_info: We believe that family comes first and education is at the top of the list.

lender.name: Wahyudi
lender.occupation: just graduated from Senior High School

lender.name: Bev & Dave
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur & Consultant

lender.name: Shivani & Niranjan
lender.loan_because: we want to make a difference

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in distributing wealth more equally across the world, and empowering people to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers to create websites.

lender.name: Mikko
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I think it is one of the most efficient, productive and satisfying ways to lend a hand to those trying to help themselves -- creating my own, essentially revolving, fund that can be used by many.
lender.occupational_info: I am a school teacher in a university's college of law (a law professor) helping train future lawyers to be socially conscious as well as professionally skilled.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: If we all don't do our part then there is a bleak future for our planet.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy giving the children dreams to pursue and the tools to get them there.

lender.name: Nguyn Khnh
lender.whereabouts: Dong Anh, Ha Noi Viet Nam

lender.name: M.O.M.S.
lender.occupation: Empty nest moms Making Our Money Serve
lender.loan_because: Random acts of kindness make the world a better place. The inscription on the heart in our photo says, "Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year." Knowing that we are helping other mothers makes it so.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of mothers with grown children who would like to see other mothers around the world succeed in their business endeavors.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and helping others is the best way to show thanks.

lender.name: Rod I.
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sam & Joanna
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to create a better future for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a commercial real estate advisor. My wife is an artist and teacher.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because:
Finding start-up capital for a business can be hard; I know. So helping someone start or expand a business, is very exciting to me!
I would like to challenge other bus drivers to make as large of loan as possible, to help people be independent and to provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: Doing the impossible for the ungrateful...
